example[1]: The firemen called out to him.
definition[1]: to ask or order a person or an organization to help, especially in a difficult or dangerous situation
example[2]: The army was called out to help fight fires.
definition[2]: to order workers to go on strike
example[3]: The transport workers were called out.
definition[3]: a situation in which someone is called to another person’s house or place of business to do repairs, help them etc
example[4]: The lifeboat has had ten call-outs in the past year.
